post.body: i'm a sad git who watches the libsyn stats after the upload and go "oh look another one has downloaded" lol. hope you enjoy.
ah yes but both need to be ignited. Wise man say "grill without flame is like Baywatch without Pamela"
now is that grilling or barbecuing John?
i'll give you almost 90 mins of content. Good. I think so but then I'm biased...lol.
Well hello Nurse! Night Gaz. :-)
i do it too Gaz. my Doh! moments
time to consider standing attop of 1 Infinite Loop with an AK-47. TC is the worst piced of kit I bought this year.
Not sure if that was the correct use of a retweet but hopefully it can help get your mac mini sold for you.
I thought a bit light on the out and out comedy but a really nice story. Follows rom-com template to the letter. Worth a look.
You just tweeted yourself again Gaz. :-)
Eww. Scary visual place. lol. Jim Carey riding it through downtown LA in a hospital gown was scary enough. Have u seen Yes Man?
@ElaineGiles "Nurse being a bloke" flashback to "Yes Man" at the weekend. Does he ride a Ducati?
I hope you get a comfy chair. :-)
I'd face the dreaded needle for the nurses praise. lol
MacCraic Christmas Special 12 Apps of Christmas released on an unsuspecting public. web (http://bit.ly/gSLU) iTunes (http://bit.ly/2eDH)
some douche bag at my wifes work called her a "f$#^ing c*nt" today. a lesson in manners is in order i think.
uploading now to libsyn's servers. 1hr 23 mins this week. We really need to work on that hour mark.
encoding the christmas special of maccraic
RT @MacCore: 1.66 Intel Mac Mini w/ SuperDrive, 1GB RAM and 80GB HD on eBay. Help Katie get to Macworld '09. http://tinyurl.com/92c3rb
